title: Font similar to Foundry Gridnik, but not quite the same. Any ideas please???
content:
I've seen this font many places before, but am at a loss as to what it is exactly. It is similar in style to Foundry Gridnik (see the angular S) but the N is completely different. Anybody care to be so kind as to relieve my mind of this query?

Cheers.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 11.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426000833/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%2011_11.png) | 43.52 KB |
author: lathen.kamas

comments.content: Hmmm...that does have quite a few similar characteristics, but you are right. Not quite it.
Similar S again, but too condensed and the N is all wrong.
Closest yet, but still not it. The N is the give away, unless that N is custom perhaps.
It’s not custom, it’s simply a n, not a N! ;-)
